pages.text: The $(item)Breaker Head$() is an $(l:engineering/automaton)Automaton$()'s key to mass destruction!$(br2)Well, not particularly. When an $(item)Automaton$() with a $(item)Breaker Head$() goes from the down state to up, this will cause any block in front to be broken and its drops spilled around.

It is to keep in mind that, due to the $(item)Breaker Head$() being made of $(item)Iron$(), that it has the same strength as an $(item)Iron Pickaxe$(), and won't be able to mine anything that one can't. Attempting to do so will block the $(item)Automaton$().$(br2)Lastly, attempting a rotation while the $(item)Automaton$() is in the up state will also block it.
May or may not be usable to pierce the heavens. Use at your own discretion.
